__e: Mikey is not gonna believe you.
I'm not naming names cos it's possible Mikey couldn't help it.
Might be the reason Mikey didn't leave nothing in his will.
Michel... That retro-mutagen was for Super Shredder.
What do you say you and me take a ride so your mother can sleep?

It would seem, on the theme of zombies to come up with something new is simply impossible, because of the cadaver, we know almost everything. But apparently the project developers Mikey the last zombie killer think very differently, so we decided to submit to the gaming community court next "masterpiece" made in pixel art to the accompaniment of electronic music.
